items.value: %113% has discovered a group of soldiers leaving the Garrison and meeting in secret.
%113% was able to tempt the disgruntled soldiers to abandon their posts. A significant amount of defenders have deserted the Garrison!
%113% was discovered by the soldiers! He managed to run away unscathed but %01@ is now aware of our sabotage attempts and have declared war upon us.
%01@ declared war on us after discovering %113%'s interference!
%113% has not returned. We can only assume the worst.
%113% discovered that the soldiers are extremely unhappy with how their superiors treat them. %113% convinced them to desert and join us.
%113% recruited a group of Human Knights.
%113% followed the soldiers and found that they were merely having a drunken party away from their superiors.
%113% did not follow the suspicious soldiers.
